job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description: In this role you should have excellent problemsolving skills and thorough knowledge of Android Device Architecture Communication and documentation are key to this role as you will be working directly with the architecture and management teamsbrulliUnderstanding of Android Device Architecture Focused on Kernel HAL DebugliliRead requirements predominantly related to Hardware peripherals Integrate provide HAL interface to ApplicationliliWe expect at least 5060 of tasks will be related to codingliliPrevious knowledge on any device development is a plusbrliulstronguPreferred EducationbrustrongulliBachelors Degree required or equivalent experienceliliMinimum of 5 years of experiencebrliulstronguKey Skills And CompetenciesbrustrongulliDevice Driver and Hardware Abstraction Layer developmentliliKnowledge of Linux Kernel BootloadersliliHands on Experience in development using any one of the languages CC JAVAliliExcellent communication skillsliliExperience with Android DevelopmentliliDemonstrated technical experienceliliDemonstrated experience working independently and collaboratively on projectsliliDemonstrated experience trouble shootingliliBroad knowledge of applicable IT systemsapplicationsliliExperience developing new systems and toolsliliExperience in documenting and maintaining up to date systems proceduresliliAdvanced analytical skillsliul
